description: Erection of single storey rear extension (5m in depth, maximum height of 3m and eaves height of 3m)
decision_conditions: The proposed single storey rear extension falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule  2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Condition 17 (Landscaping Scheme) - The RBK Tree and Landscape Officer has reviewed the information submitted and is satisfied that this condition can now be approved.

The applicant Mr Matthew Evans had already used the free go scheme for the application 22/02519/FUL for the site Unit 2, The Griffin Centre, Market Place, KT1 1JT. There is no another free go for the same applicant and the same site. Free go is only one time for the same applicant and same site in whole life. Therefore this application is not entitle for a free go. The fee required for your planning application is Â£ 132.00.  Payment can be made via either our Contact Centre on 0208 547 5002, by cheque made payable to Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames or online via the Kingston council website.
